content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the klaipeda district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the applicant was awarded an apartment and a car as their personal property the court also ordered the defendant to pay the applicant a sum of money as financial compensation for their greater share of the common property the court declared the dissolution of the marriage between the parties but both parties will remain jointly responsible for debts owed to a creditor the court referenced specific articles of the civil code that discuss the division of property the applicant brought various requests including the dissolution of the marriage establishment of residence for minor children access arrangements maintenance payments division of property and payment of legal costs the breakdown of the marriage was attributed to the fault of the defendant the court received a defense application from the defendant who accepted fault for the breakdown of the marriage an amicable settlement agreement was approved regarding the residence contact arrangements and maintenance of the minor children the court will now decide on the division of the community property including the disputed value and compensation for the apartment the court will also consider outstanding debts related to the joint property and the obligations of the parties towards the creditor the court concluded that the defendant will be awarded the apartment and will compensate the plaintiff for their greater share of the common property the court also addressed the allocation of costs in the proceedings the marriage has been dissolved and the defendant has been ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings the plaintiff will receive a refund of the stamp duty they paid
